subject: Valued Email Subscriber Update
body:
To ensure that you continue to receive important Miles Kimball emails, please add
      MilesKimball@mileskimball.p0.com to your Address Book or Safe List. Thank you.
      
















Dear Email Subscriber,

You may have been receiving our email newsletter as a result of signing up to receive them, or through a purchase from Miles Kimball or its family of companies.

 
As a valued member of the Miles Kimball email program, you're among the first to hear about: 
 

    ~ Exclusive offers just for email members
    ~ Special sale events
    ~ New arrivals
    ~ And much more

Our goal is to make your shopping experience enjoyable and easy, and is why we strive to provide products that make your home fun and functional. We know your needs may change over time. Should you wish to no longer receive our emails, please click on the "unsubscribe" link, which you'll find at the bottom of every email.

To say thanks for being a valued subscriber,  we're offering a 15% discount on all online orders* through May 7, 2007 when you click through this email.
Visit MilesKimball.com now!






          * Receive 15% off your order when you shop online and click through this email. Your discount will be applied at checkout and cannot be used with any other offer. Offer expires at midnight (Central) 05/07/2007.

This email was sent to you because you asked to
receive updates and promotions from Miles Kimball.
          
If you have any questions about our Online Privacy
Policy, please check out our website.



If you would like to unsubscribe from receiving emails like this in the future, click here. 

            
            Miles Kimball Co., 250 City Center, Oshkosh, WI 54906
